name: Cajuputum
Relationship: Compare: Bovista.; Nux mosch.; Asaf.; Ign.; Bapt.

Head: As if he could not get himself together
Feels much enlarged
Mouth: TONGUE FEELS SWOLLEN, fills whole mouth
Constricted sensation on swallowing solid food

details: Acts like Oil of Cloves. A remedy for FLATULENCE and affections of the tongue. SENSE OF ENLARGEMENT. Causes copious diaphoresis. Retrodecent gout. Neuralgic affection not inflammatory. Nervous dyspnoea.
dosage: First to third potency. (5 drops of oil.)
